title: Your favorite recipes
text: Get ready to get hungry with this project! I accepted the challenge to create a professional-looking app in just a couple of days as a developer test for a Spanish company called Mutter.

I decided to go for a recipe search app using the Yummly API, because who doesn't love food? But, as you know, APIs can take a while to return a result, so I added a spinning fork loading screen to keep it fun.

And to show off my skills, I went all out and implemented an MVC architecture to keep the code clean and organized. The best part is that the code is public on my GitHub page, so check it out and let me know what you think!
And I'm happy to say that I got the job as a developer!
